original_text: And he shall bring it to the priest, and the priest shall take a handful of it as its memorial portion and burn this on the altar, on the Lord's food offerings; it is a sin offering.
korean_text: 그것을 제사장에게로 가져갈 것이요 제사장은 그것을 기념물로 한 움큼을 가져다가 제단 위 여호와의 화제물 위에서 불사를지니 이는 속죄제라

sentences.original_text: And he shall bring it to the priest
and the priest shall take a handful of it
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 그것에서 한 움큼을 취할 것이요

sentences.original_text: and burn this on the altar
